name: G-33
description:
Controls:ARROW KEYS-MOVE   SPACE-SHOOT  Q-ABOND SPACESHIP

G-33 is a unique space shotter where you need to collect gold and keep away from the enemies.You need to shoot gold asteroids 3 times to mine them and collect gold you also can shoot enemies to kill them.

Your health points are represented by red sphere at the top of the screen when you are almost ded(or always if u want) you can abond the space ship and try to find a new one.
